lines.content: * Finds and lists all clubs in address book matching any number of search conditions.
public static final String MESSAGE_USAGE = COMMAND_WORD + " (" + COMMAND_SHORT
+ "): Find clubs that match all of "
+ "the specified search conditions and display them in the list on the left.\n"
+ "Search Conditions: a/ - by address, e/ - by email, n/ - by name, p/ - by phone, t/ - by tag, "
+ "s/ - by existing member statuses (a, c, e, p)\n"
+ "Example: " + COMMAND_WORD + " n/ tennis basketball t/ school t/ evening"
+ " - searches for clubs tagged with 'school' and 'evening' that contain either 'tennis' or 'basketball'";
* Finds and lists all persons in address book matching any number of search conditions.

+ "): Find persons that match all of "

+ "Search Conditions: a/ - by address, e/ - by email, n/ - by name, p/ - by phone, t/ - by tag, "
+ "s/ - by existing membership statuses (a, c, e, p)\n"
+ "Example: " + COMMAND_WORD + " n/ alice bob t/ friend t/ paid"
+ " - searches for persons tagged as 'friend' and 'paid' with names containing 'alice' or 'bob'";
* Copies the details of a club, identified using it's displayed index, to the user's clipboard.
public static final String MESSAGE_USAGE = COMMAND_WORD + " (" + COMMAND_SHORT
+ "): Copies details of a club identified by the index number to the user's clipboard.\n"
+ "An optional keyword may be added to specify what to copy.\n"
+ "Keywords: n - name, p - phone, e - email, a - address, m - members, * - full details\n"
+ "The '*' keyword specifies all club details to be copied "
+ "Example: " + COMMAND_WORD + " 1 - copies name, phone, email, address and tags\n"
+ "Example: " + COMMAND_WORD + " 1 * - copies full club and member details";
